- Product page: https://dhtmlx.com/docs/products/dhtmlxGantt/

This project ships DHTMLX Gantt Standard Edition JS/CSS for offline usage under vendor/dhtmlx/.
The main plugin is GPL-2.0-only, which is compatible with DHTMLX Standard Edition.
